I brought my kids for the last hurrah before going back to school and we had a BLAST. France was very awesome and let us use paddle board and kayak. The pier was great for swimming and the water is awesome.
France, thanks for opening your home and allowing us some GREAT memories.
Peter
France was an amazing host! We loved the house and the lake. Everything was so clean. We will definitely stay again.

We had an amazing week on the lake! I stayed with my extended family of 8 adults, and 3 kids. We loved having large tables inside and out so the whole family could eat together. The kitchen was well equipped with everything we needed, including an extensive spice drawer.
All the furniture and beds were very comfortable and AC on the 2nd floor made it very easy to get a good night's sleep.
It was great having plenty of deck furniture and shady spots to relax with a view of the lake. We enjoyed using both the kayak and paddle board to explore the lake, so much easier than trying to rent from the marina. The water was perfect and super shallow with a sandy bottom--great for the kids to swim and play! There were also 2 drying racks for hanging swim suits and towels that came in very handy.
There are a LOT of stairs from the road to the house which made carrying luggage and groceries difficult. However, we were glad the house was down close to the lake. Hoping to be back in the future!
Great location!
Loved our stay on the lake, view from deck was amazing. Host were so friendly and accommodating!
great little cottage. so peaceful sitting out by the lake!! would definitely come back!!

The Cottage is our preferred destination for our annual girls‚Äô weekend! It allows us to relax and take in the amazing views but also for us to kayak and walk. The deck and fire pit are in use almost the entire time with exception of when we are on the dock or doing activities.
The view of Fish Lake and all of the wild life is breathtaking.
Chris and Missy are the perfect hosts and are extremely friendly! We will definitely be back again!
Great location! very quite and comfortable very clean!

Wonderful stay at Chris‚Äôs place! We had a wedding and the cottage was only 7 minutes from the venue! Very quiet with a beautiful lake outside the window. Chris was very accommodating. Great for a short weekend stay!

My family stayed here for Labor Day weekend and it was PERFECT. Chris was extremely helpful and friendly. The property was immaculate and had everything we needed to have a perfect weekend getaway. The beautiful views, countless amenities, and private location made this a gem of a property. Will definitely be saving to hopefully return in the future!

We loved the cottage. It was immaculate, beautiful and cozy. The lake is peaceful and relaxing. We especially had fun using the kayaks and the huge floating raft. Chris and Missy are awesome hosts and didn‚Äôt miss a beat with the amenities and the extra little touches that made our stay memorable and wonderful.
We love this cottage so much we have stayed three times. It has a beautiful view of the lake and it is so peaceful. It is a great place to relax and leave your worries behind.

Super host Chris was fantastic! So many amenities in the house, which I wasn‚Äôt expecting, coffee, tea, snacks, water, plus others that were advertised. His communication skills superb, including a binder with all pertinent information. Missy, his wife, has great style. Home was nicely decorated.
I felt like I was right at home! We got to meet their great family too!.

Perfect size for the 4 of us. We loved the area. Perfect retreat if you are looking for peace and serenity. We were in the lake every single day. Fishing was good and we loved the kayaks. Beds are comfortable as well. After a long day in the sun, we loved sitting on the deck over the water and starting a fire. All in all we would definitely come back. On a side note outside of the property. Just know most restaurants are closed on Sunday-Tuesday, so be sure to pack food to cook. Chris was very kind, helpful, and quick to respond.
We had a great stay! Cozy and clean cottage. We enjoyed the lake and fishing. Our kids had a blast!!

My sister and I needed a little weekend getaway, and this was the perfect place for it! It was quiet and peaceful and we left feeling recharged and refreshed! We had everything we needed! Chris and Missy were very welcoming and kind, but let us do our thing while still being around if we needed anything. I‚Äôd love to come back to stay again!

My family and I have been staying on Fish Lake for years and love it. This house was perfect for 4 of us. We prob could have even fit another with the couch pull out. It was clean, comfortable and they had everything we needed (and more they thought of everything right down to a first aid kit which we needed!). This part of the lake is amazing‚Ä¶shallow, clean, warm and full sun all day. Thankful for this house rental!
We had a nice stay on Fish Lake. The cottage is small but perfect for us. Chris was a great host and we‚Äôve already talked about going back again.

We loved our stay on Fish Lake! Cottage was clean and comfortable and was stocked with all the necessities. We had a great time swimming off the dock, sitting on the deck, and kayaking around the lake. The flat top griddle grill was perfect for cooking out. We will definitely be back!

This trip was very last minute so I was afraid we wouldn‚Äôt be able to find a place to stay at all, and then we found this gem! We had so much fun on the kayaks and on the big floaty by the dock. We had a few fires for s‚Äômores and even got to see a beautiful summer storm. The house was clean, cozy, and had all the accommodations listed. Chris lives next door so he came by to introduce himself and bring over a new coffee pot since the old one was cracked during the previous renter‚Äôs stay. He was very communicative and overall really wonderful to work with! I hope we can rent this magical little lake house again in the future!
Beautiful place, can‚Äôt wait to come back!

This was just what we were hoping for. Beautiful, peaceful lake, very swim-able, great deck and lake view from the house. We mostly stayed right there at the cottage. We really appreciated the abundant beach towels and fun snacks!
Highly recommend Trojan Timbers park for a great wooden shaded playground.

Such a cozy cottage on a clean and peaceful lake . Everything you need and then some to make it comfortable. A place to retreat to where there are no other expectations than relax, enjoy the lake and cook food . It‚Äôs the best !
Second time I‚Äôve stayed here and I love it.
Super nice and helpful hosts.
Quaint, beautiful home on the lake! Love to be extra surprises from the host-snacks and bottled water! Super easy to get in very communicative! We only wish we had more time to enjoy the home!

Beautiful home and beautiful hosts. They were right next door and were incredibly friendly! They even went out of their way and surprised my 16 year old with a treat for her birthday. It was clean, enough room for all of us and very reasonably priced for a cabin right on the lake. We had fun and we‚Äôre able to relax. Win win in our book!
Beautiful view beautiful home and so peaceful! I would recommend to anyone who wants small cozy and tight at home feel all in one! Chris was an amazing host and was super respectful!
Wonderful getaway for our Honeymoon.
Our stay at Champs II was wonderful. The perfect getaway the hubby and I needed. We hope to come back in the summer.
Perfect place for weekend get away peace and quite

We named this the Fish Cottage as it is perfectly decorated with all things fish and was so bright and fun! This is a place to relax, enjoy the incredible views day or night, or go out on the water in kayaks. I normally like to unwind at the end of the day by watching TV, and there was a nice TV with firestick that didn‚Äôt get used! We didn‚Äôt want to burn any daylight or miss out on the cozy fire pit.
There are options for going out for meals but we didn‚Äôt want to miss out on staying at the cottage and either eating by the fire or on the back porch with tremendous views at either. We will be back!
cut, comfortable bungalow
Great place lake access was wonderful
We are repeat visitors and we loved the cottage like we did last year. Chris is a gracious host and all our needs were met.
This is the cutest little cottage. It is clean and beds are comfortable. The outdoor space is wonderful with a deck and a dock. The water is clear and the kayaks add to the fun.

We had a wonderful time at the cottage! Everything was just as described/pictured. It is a quiet, dead-end road/area of the lake. It was a nice area for walking or a run further along the lake past many cute cottages/homes. Our favorite spots were the deck and the screened-in porch, which was a great place for meals and games. We appreciated the kayaks, the inflatable, the deck chairs... all the amenities and lovely decorations. Communication with Chris was terrific. We had 4 adults - me, my husband and a grown son/his wife - and we wouldn't have wanted any more people as the cottage is cozy. The space works well, though, and had everything we needed. The beds were super comfortable. Ceiling fans and screened windows let us enjoy the cooler temperatures with fresh air day and night, but the air conditioner cooled things off in a hurry if needed. S'mores at the fire pit were also a highlight. Fish Lake has beautiful clear water and we enjoy the area. We would love to come and stay here again!
Great place to stay. Nice lake and well equipped, Chris was easy to work with.
Perfect cottage. Clean. Every detail thought off to make it comfortable. Owners are responsive and very kind. I Hope to go back!

This was the perfect weekend get away! Chris and Missy really executed their space in the best way, forgetting no details! The water was so incredible and the ambience of the cottage made us feel right at home. Leaving was the hardest part!

Just wanna give a shout-out to Chris for being an awesome host while we stayed in his cottage. Our little family really enjoyed our stay here. It was so cozy, very comfortable, and definitely relaxing. Not to mention having lake access was absolutely amazing. We will definitely be back for another stay!

Have been here twice now and still LOVE it! Very relaxing and sweet little cottage, amazing view of the lake. The kayaks are a great perk and the raft is so relaxing. Love this place!!! Chris is also a very helpful host.
Cottage was great. Great golf course nearby as well as the food recommended. Would definitely rent again only longer next time.

Our family of 3 had a wonderful stay at the cottage!! The cottage was nice and cozy, felt like home away from home. The lake in front of the house was perfect for our 2 year old to play in, not too deep. The Blackstone was awesome to cook on, nice touch. Chris & his wife were friendly and helpful- communication was a breeze, Chris was prompt to respond to any questions I had. We would consider coming back here again!!
Everything was as listed and was a perfect place to sleep between rounds of golf. Easy coordinating with owners on arrival and departure.

Thanks for having us. The place made for a perfect little getaway for our family. Chris was proactive with providing all the useful info to make our stay as smooth as could be. The lake and inflatable raft were a hit with our boys and the neighbor-kids were very friendly, even inviting our boys to play. Thanks again.

Chris was an amazing host, and this property was quaint, clean, and lovely. The view off the deck overlooking clear and beautiful Fish Lake made for a couple days of fun, peaceful relaxation. Taking a morning paddle out on the kayaks was wonderful and the lake was quite warm overall in early July when we visited. Plenty of fun floating off the dock and there's a flat-top grill to use too! (now I want to get one!) Overall a great stay if you want to spend some close time with your friends or family.
This is a rustic cottage that is nice, but could use a bit more attention to detail from the owners that would really enhance the guest experience.
Great little cottage on the lake. Very relaxing and peaceful.

Chris was a great host and very easy to communicate with and quick to respond. The place had everything as stated. It is a cozy cottage with kayaks, fire pit and screened in porch overlooking the water. It was a great place for a getaway. Shaded deck and a dock for sitting in the sun. Would def go back!

Adorable little cottage on a nice private lake . Was perfect for my 8 and 6 year old kids . Chris was available and helpful .
Everything you need is already in the cottage. They thought of everything. If I didn‚Äôt have to be back to work I would have absolutely stayed one more night .
It‚Äôs cute, cozy and comfortable. Definitely one of my most favorite places I‚Äôve ever stayed .
Tucked away from traffic and noise but there‚Äôs a store and a DG and a gas station about 7 minutes away . Can‚Äôt compliment this place enough . I‚Äôm already looking to go back very soon .
Absolutely loved our stay! Very clean, full of amenities, hosts were great! Will definitely be back, and will stay here again.

Amazing! Everything was perfect. Chris was an excellent communicator and went above and beyond to ensure we had a great stay. When we told him we wouldn't arrive until after midnight, he made the pull-out bed, and left the lights on for us. Gorgeous scenery, quiet mornings and nights, and a perfect spot to either be in the sun or enjoy the breeze in the shade. This will be our go-to spot for future trips to visit family and friends.

Quaint cottage on a beautiful lake. We loved all the personal touches and the cottage was very well stocked with everything you might need, down to a first aid kit. Chris and his wife were lovely and responded to our requests and an unavoidable issue we had with hot water very promptly. They offered the use of their bathroom next door while it was being repaired. My kids loved swimming in the lake, the kayaks and fishing. We had a wonderful break. Thank you Chris and Family.
Perfect for a weekend getaway! Will definitely be back (hopefully) when the weather is nicer
Nice cozy cottage on a great lake. Really enjoyed using the blackstone to cook meals.
Had a blast! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

The house was great, it had everything we needed for a little weekend get away. Being right on the water and a spacious deck overlooking the lake was a great way to relax. Chris was great with communication, was always quick to respond, and gave some great info about the area.

This is a great place for a quiet getaway. Located close enough to Chicago for a quick trip, but far enough away to get away from it all. The cottage is immaculately clean, comfy and well stocked. The host really did think of everything. The deck overlooking the lake is the perfect place to relax with a fire after spending the day in the water (inner tubes & kayaks). The home also has lake access with a pier (bring your boat?). The water off the pier is not deep and crystal clear, perfect for families with younger children. The location is tucked away so prepare for a short drive (15 - 20 minutes) for groceries etc. We totally relaxed and enjoyed ourselves and look forward to visiting again next year.
Everything was great! All amenities provided were used and helpful. Loved the view every morning, wish we could have stayed longer.

This little cottage was the best place for a little get away. We loved the interior decorations. It was very cozy and perfect for our family. The view of the lake was stunning. Chris was very accommodating. We can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

My wife and I absolutely loved our stay here! The house was spotlessly clean and very comfortable. We spent a lot of time swimming and sitting on the deck the weather was perfect for a nice fire in the evening. Chris was very friendly and easy to get ahold of. Couldn't have asked for anything else out of the experience truly a little piece of heaven. Can't wait to go again next season!

We had a great time. The cottage is super cute and clean. We have two boys. They had a great time. This is the perfect family setup. The cottage is equipped with everything you will need. The lake is clean and safe for kids to swim. We hope to return soon.

Loved the cabin and the beautiful surroundings. Great location, right on the clear and warm Fish lake. We swam off the dock and used the kayaks provided at the dock. Enjoyed watching the boaters go by on the lake while sitting on comfy chairs on the deck (under the shade from the oak tree). Played games on the screened in porch. Porch to the deck was only steps away, everything very convenient. Cabin is updated and stylishly decorated. Chris let us know we could check in early and also let us know we could stay later than 11 due to the schedule that day, which we appreciated. We want to return soon. Thank you!
Wonderful place to get away

We have many wonderful memories from our stay on Fish Lake. Perfect weather helped provide an opportunity for us to unwind, relax, and take in all that summer at the lake has to offer. Fishing off the pier and kayaking around the lake were highlights of our time there.
Chris was a great host and the cottage was equipped inside and out with everything we wanted and needed. We were also grateful for the comfortable beds and pillows.

Our stay included some severe storms, and power outages. Chris kept in contact with us and the neighbors kept checking on us to make sure we were OK. Despite mother nature having other plans in store for us, we did enjoy our stay! The cottage was beautiful- cozy, clean and with amazing views. looking forward to revisiting again in the future!

Small fishing cottage. Not much to do in the area so if you‚Äôre looking for a quiet stay by the water this will be a good fit for you! Enjoyed access to the kayaks and swimming.
Great small cottage on a quiet like. Exactly what we were hoping for. Thank you so much!

10/10 recommend. This was the perfect little lake house for a weekend away! The view and lake access created such a peaceful ambience. The provided snacks and water were a very nice added touch. Chris and Missy were extremely kind and had great communication every step of the way!

Great little cottage on a nice lake with a sandy shoreline and bkttom. All the amenities for a pleasant stay including kayaks a a nice, huge raft. We enjoyed watching the lake action. We brought our bikes and rode around the neighboring lakes. Also did the Warnaar mountain bike trail nearby. Hosts were excellent.
If you like boating and fishing, this is the place for you. It would make a great guys trip location.

This beautifully decorated cottage was a perfect getaway for three friends. Every small space was engineered for usefulness and every time we needed something it was right there. The three-season porch, the deck and the view were the highlights for us. Highly recommended!
The hosts are fantastic and helpful. The cabin is adorably decorated and furnished. The setting is perfect for total relaxation and calm. Stay here. You will not be disappointed!

We loved staying here for a 3 day girls getaway. The lake is beautiful and so clear. Chris and his family are great hosts and neighbors! He truly meant that if we needed anything to let him know and he was right there. We will book this stay for many weekend getaways! thank you!
The cottage was great! We enjoyed the lake, the kayaks, and the campfire. Thank you, Chris, everything was wonderful!

We loved our stay at Chris' cottage. It's great to be right on the lake. This lake is quiet and relatively small, which makes it great for kayaking and probably swimming (we were there in October so we only kayaked). It's incredibly peaceful and beautiful.
Chris is a responsive, responsible host. The cottage was lovely with so many cute stylish touches. Beds comfortable. We had a lovely visit. We visited Plumb Lake County Park for some hiking and enjoyed checking out Shipshewana with its cute stores and Amish countryside. I would love to return.
The cottage is so comfy and homey. Chris is super responsive and helpful. Loved our Fall weekend away.

Outstanding experience all around. The owner was fantastic, the communication could not have been better. The place was so fresh and clean it felt like home! Wonderful place on a beautiful Lake! We will be back!

The view is great, we spent most of our time on the deck which is right on the water, and the fall colors were lovely. The sunroom was also very cozy and a great place to eat, color, etc.,
Every aspect of our experience was great, and this place was very nicely and thoughtfully our together. I can definitely see is returning here for future relaxing getaways.

Our stay at Chris‚Äôs place was amazing. We had such a relaxing long weekend. The cottage was sparkling clean when we arrived. The view of the lake is amazing. The place was perfect, exactly what we were looking for. Chris is a quick responder, check in was smooth, and the location on the lake is unbeatable, Kayaks were my favorite! Would definitely come back!
This place is super cute and the water is super clear. We had a great time relaxing outside and on the dock.
Nice, cute, relaxing lake cabin!

-Lisa

Great host that paid attention to details. The beds were comfortable and the area was peaceful. Very cute home!
Great place to rest and regenerate. Felt like a home with great snacks and amenities that help with an early morning departure. A great place. 10/10
Great stay! Just what our family needed. üòä

We enjoyed The Upper Room. It was perfect for our getaway. The place was very clean and a great location for what we had planned.

wonderful place to stay! super great location and super cute!

Thank you so much for a wonderful stay! Thank you for offering such a clean, comfortable space! We were at ease staying here and would stay again. Great Job and Thank you!
Quite little place. Very clean and spacious. The Upper Room was very clean. I was very impressed with the size of the area. Felt right at home.

We have been blessed staying at the ‚ÄúUpper Room‚Äù. Anthony and Lisa are very kind and helpful, the apartment was so clean and well stocked. I‚Äôd highly recommend it to anyone that is able to go up the steps to their above garage apartment.

Great place to stay at.

The hospitality was remarkable and they cleaned the place beautifully!
Very comfortable place to stay!
Fantastic place, clean and bright, perfect for our short stay. We hope to be back.
Great, relaxing, and clean space.
Thanks again for a great stay!

My family and I are very thankful for Anthony and Lisa. Great stay, and great communication and coordination

We found the accommodations here very suitable for what we wanted. It was clean, great priced and close to were we wanted to go. Can recommend the place to others. The stairway to the upper room is not not completely renovated yet but inside was very very neat , tidy, clean and very roomy. Thank-you!
Ron & Kay
Anthony and Lisa were very helpful with my last minute reservation. I have never been to the area, or state even, and their place was easy to find and comfortable for my overnight stay!
I‚Äôve stayed here multiple times when in town for work and I‚Äôm never disappointed.
Nice clean place with friendly host! Will definitely stay again!
Nice, clean and peaceful place to relax and spend the night.
Anthony and Lisa‚Äôs place is really sweet. The room is comfortable and the kitchen is clean and welcoming. Great place to stay.

This was a great place to stay. Easy location to get in and out of and the cost was of great value providing the privacy a hotel doesn‚Äôt give you. When I come to the area again I will most certainly book again.

Greta accommodation.

Anthony & Lisa most helpful, even helped us change a flat tire
If needed I would book again
Peter
Cute place, very convenient location off the highway.
I always enjoy my stay. I stay here when I‚Äôm in town for work. It‚Äôs private, peaceful and the place is always clean.
